## kic new java-webapi

Create a new Java WebAPI app

```
kic new java-webapi [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                help for java-webapi
  -n, --node-port int       Node Port for App (default 30080)
      --show                Show the bash command
  -u, --url-prefix string   URL prefix for ingress
```
